amendment.description: Amendment transfers $25 million from the NATO Security Investment Program to the Military Construction Army National Guard account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding for Military Construction Authorization by $25 million through transfer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Mica.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
